message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm hoping to get a better deal. I'd be willing to pay $105 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125.
Okay, Alice.  $125 is still a bit high for me. How about $115? I'm really interested in getting this product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $122.50. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my budget. How about $118? That's a good compromise and would make this deal work for me.
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Bob. I'll offer it to you for $121. This is my last offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
